attributes.magic: Zip archive data, at least v2.0 to extract, compression method=store

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Parent Double Extension File Execution
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect execution of suspicious double extension files in ParentCommandLine

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "-ExecutionPolicy" flag.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may use hidden windows to conceal malicious activity from the plain sight of users.
In some cases, windows that would typically be displayed when an application carries out an operation can be hidden

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Start-Process powershell -WindowStyle hidden -ArgumentList "-WindowStyle Hidden", "-NoLogo", "-NoProfile", "-ExecutionPolicy Bypass", "-EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=cc4a222f-cb08-4640-8209-fb334956b143; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious LNK Double Extension File Created
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of files with an "LNK" as a second extension. This is sometimes used by malware as a method to abuse the fact that Windows hides the "LNK" extension by default.

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\7za.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\q3e2zbzl.xm3\JD-Meta-Ads-Manager.pdf.lnk; EventID=11}
@{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\7za.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\q3e2zbzl.xm3\Meeting-Registration-Form.docx.lnk}
@{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\q3e2zbzl.xm3\JD-Meta-Ads-Manager.pdf.lnk; EventID=11}
@{Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\q3e2zbzl.xm3\Meeting-Registration-Form.docx.lnk; EventID=11}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
When C# is compiled dynamically, a .cmdline file will be created as a part of the process.
Certain processes are not typically observed compiling C# code, but can do so without touching disk.
This can be used to unpack a payload for execution
